h2.div: Project management chart to monitor timeline, tasks, roadmaps, milestones, dependencies, resources!

div.p: Visualize enterprise project data with ease! Use advanced enterprise level capabilities to show how project breaks down into tasks, subtasks, and track project milestones and more.

xViz Gantt Chart is a modern project planning tool for Power BI which helps to articulate, communicate, and monitor the progress of projects. Business users leverage the unique enterprise features such as alerting, milestone configuration, task dependencies, creating connector lines, and live editing on the fly to empower project reporting in their organization with Power BI.

ul.li: 2 Modes - Regular Gantt for project management and Gantt Resource for tailored view of resource planning, allocation, and review.
Display Connector Lines - Define customizable connector lines to visualize dependencies
Data Grid: Conditionally formatted data grids to draw attention to priority tasks
Status Flag: Add customized status flag to determine the status of the task
Progress Bar: Color code the bar to notify the task progress and to drive attention
Milestone Configuration - Specify important points along the progress of task in Gantt using milestones with customizable icon shape/color
Advanced Analytics - Display reference lines, reference bands highlighting key project metrics in the visual
Bullet/ Bar View - Progress Bars can be toggled between bullet and bar views for advanced insights
Expand/Collapse - Quickly expand/ collapse hierarchy data with a single click
Runtime Zoom - Interactive zoom in and out of timeline view, customize default zoom range
Extra Columns - Add multiple categories and columns, format visual title, and customize column width
Embed External URL - single click action navigation to external webpages from your dashboards/ reports
Fiscal Year Support - customize your timeline based on your company's fiscal year
Ragged Hierarchy - View unbalanced hierarchy with ease by hiding blank categories
Live Editing - Adjust timelines with ease on the fly as project deliverables are met between tasks and visualize task dependencie
Summary Table - gain a tabular overview to slice and filter your data

li.p: Trusted by 3000+ customers, including most Fortune 500 companies
